Title: uv format: Code Formatting Comes to uv (experimentally!)
Description:
The latest uv release (0.8.13) quietly introduced an experimental new command that Python developers have been waiting for: uv format. This addition brings code formatting directly into uv‚Äôs toolkit, eliminating the need to juggle multiple tools for basic Python development workflows.
What is uv format?
    The uv format command provides Python code formatting through uv‚Äôs interface. Under the hood, it calls Ruff‚Äôs formatter to automatically style your code according to consistent standards.

Why do software developers love complexity?
Description: The Great Pyramids took decades to build. It was a monumental feat of human ingenuity and collaboration. Today, we software developers erect our own pyramids each day - not from stone, but from code. Yet despite far more advanced tools, these systems don‚Äôt always make the experience better. So why, when KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) is a well-known mantra, do we keep gravitating toward complexity?
